name: Strawberry Cookies
description: Strawberry cookies are tender, sweet, and full of fresh strawberry flavor. These cookies are the real deal-- no artificial colors or flavors!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fresh strawberries, brunoised (diced very small) ($2.13)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Toss the diced strawberries and lemon juice together and let them sit while you prep the rest of the cookie dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss

recipeInstructions.text: Cream both sugars and room-temperature butter together using your hand mixer on low speed.
recipeInstructions.name: Cream

recipeInstructions.text: Add the egg and vanilla extract to the creamed butter and sugars. Whisk or mix on low until consistent.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk

recipeInstructions.text: Then, add the flour, salt, and baking powder to a mixing bowl and whisk dry ingredients together. Adding a spoonful or so at a time, slowly mix in all of your dry ingredients with the wet ingredients until a consistent dough forms.
recipeInstructions.name: Add

recipeInstructions.text: Strain the strawberries, discarding the juice.* Gently fold in strawberries and white chocolate chips into the cookie dough.**
recipeInstructions.name: Fold

recipeInstructions.text: With a 2-ounce scoop, drop cookie dough balls 2-3 inches apart on a parchment-lined baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, depending on how crispy or chewy you like your cookies!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake
